title: Happy Friday, Rapid Fire Questions, Aretha, Carters, Are You Smarter Than Tommy, Steve VS Tommy, Chapman's, Millennials, George Clooney, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Happy Friday, Rapid Fire Questions, Aretha, Carters, Are You Smarter Than Tommy, Steve VS Tommy, Chapman's, Millennials, George Clooney, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
Happy Friday! The show opens with the whole crew and Steve talks about those he is and isn't fond of. The Carters get a key to the city of Columbia, SC. Are You Smarter Than Tommy? Steve VS Tommy. The return of Bad Acting Theater. The Chapman's. Things that millennials will say when they grow older. George Clooney tops Forbes list of highest paid actors this year. Today in Closing Remarks, Uncle Steve talks about your real friends and much more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
